creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: fan shaped format; nine bold lines of calligraphy; light red seals, LLC and URC
inscription: 層巒舊長千尋木，遠壑初飛百丈泉 (Layered peaks: from of old, here grow trees, thousands of feet tall; Distant ravines: from the origin, here fly waterfalls, hundreds of fathoms high.) [Transl. from Fischer 2007, p. 109]
title: Song Zhiwen's Layered Peaks
